name: Tale about Tela (first chapter/first part/demo/unfinished thingie)
name_original: Tale about Tela (first chapter/first part/demo/unfinished thingie)
description:
The thingie I made, a first part of the full game. This project is about as old as Undertale (of course a bit younger. Like several months younger), I'm glad I finally did something finished (well, sort of finished).

I honestly don't know if I'll make the full game because quite frankly I'm tired of it <) But I'll try. But maybe I'll make some other game in the meantime, I have a couple of game ideas and one of them is even feasible <)

btw, if you find bugs - tell me in the comments. I tried to find every bug but you can never be sure you got everything.
